system.requirements: Rogue Trader, RT Rank 2+. Possesses Renowned Warrant Talent. May need a Patron and their Letter of Marque.
system.descriptionText: A Rogue Trader turns to a Piratical lifestyle via a Letter of Marque amended to their Warrant of Trade. This allows such acts of piracy with legal legitimacy against some specific group while maintaining the protection of a patron backer.
system.effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Calixian Privateer

description.value:
A Rogue Trader turns to a Piratical lifestyle via a Letter of Marque amended to their Warrant of Trade. This allows such acts of piracy with legal legitimacy against some specific group while maintaining the protection of a patron backer.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Calixian Privateer
